COMMENT_TX: $start of game delayed due to Martin Luther King's funeral
$the Yankees disputed the home run ruling, saying that the ball hit the railing
$Joe Pepitone suffered hairline fracture of left elbow on throw
Lights on at start of game

ej,michg101,P,drumc901,Fighting ej,hortt101,P,drumc901,Fighting $after a pickoff attempt, there was some jostling and Gene Michael threw a punch at Tony Horton; both benches cleared; as Michael was being restrained by Yankees coach Whitey Ford, Michael threw another punch at Horton; Michael and Horton ejected by 1B umpire Cal Drummond
$Mickey Mantle called for interference when he ran into his own batted ball
$Jose Cardenal ran inside the base line and was called out for interference
$Rich Rollins hit on lip and left game
Dave Boswell left with heat exhaustion
ej,bryab101,P,hallb901,Call at HP Billy Bryan ejected by HP umpire Bill Haller
$Paul Blair out on appeal for leaving 3B too soon
ej,houkr101,M,honoj901,Call at HP Yankees Manager Ralph Houk ejected by HP umpire Jim Honochick
$Paul Blair slipped and the ball rolled to the monuments
Debut game for Joe Keough $Home run in first ML at-bat
ej,ermec101,M,chyln901,Interference non-call Twins Manager Cal Ermer ejected by HP umpire Nestor Chylak
ej,mantm101,P,soarh901,Fair/foul call Mickey Mantle ejected by 3B umpire Hank Soar
Lights on at start of game
$Game called due to 1 a.m. curfew; the game was replayed as part of a double header on 8/25
$Steve Barber called for interference at 2B; Horace Clarke out
$a foul ball struck Al Kaline on the foot
